original_text: And they gave out of the tribe of the children of Judah, and out of the tribe of the children of Simeon, these cities which are here mentioned by name.
korean_text: 유다 자손의 지파와 시므온 자손의 지파 중에서는 이 아래에 기명한 성읍들을 주었는데

sentences.original_text: out of the tribe of the children of Judah
and out of the tribe of the children of Simeon
which are here mentioned by name
